name: WWW (WorldWideWar)
description:
WWW is a game made for the #OperaGXJam

A long time ago, some mysterious ships started stealing the internet connection from different planets. This incident marked the beginning of the World Wide... War!
Your mission is to travel through the entire galaxy, rescue allies and avoid your enemies in this never ending galaxy war.

You can play alone or with a friend with the local multiplayer mode!

Good luck, I hope you enjoy it! :D

------------------------------

CONTROLS:

Player 1: Move with 'WASD', tractor beam with 'SPACE'

Player 2: Move with the 'ARROWS', tractor beam with 'RIGHT SHIFT'
